entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android Crashes when removing an Item from ObservableCollection that is used as ItemSource in ListView #8912
  • PlatformBehavior can't be attached to a view Behaviors list #8907
  • Using a compatibility renderer on Windows fails to render the control #8906
  • MAUI App Black out on iPhone device #8904
  • MAUI Image not render in Android #8902
  • Changing app icon of .NET MAUI app, then invoking MediaPicker crashes the app #8901
  • Invoking PropertyChanged() on .NET Maui does not notify Binding View on Android. Works on Windows and iOS. #8900
  • VS 17.3p3: Border StrokeShape=RoundRectangle fails to draw #8898
  • Building .NET MAUI Class Library fails #8897
  • .NET MAUI-Content Page template broken #8896
  • .NET MAUI GestureRecognizers not working on certain controls #8895
  • Error - selected execution mode not supported in MAUI #8894
  • Unable to publish .NET MAUI app on Mac - Runtime Identifier error #8893
  • CollectionView not scrolling inside a StackLayout or without setting HeightRequest #8888
  • SVG is not displaying #8887
  • Running App in Android Simulator won't deploy app(Takes long time) #8882
  • Centralized Permissions #8881
  • IsEnabled doesn't update visual state after being updated with INotifyPropertyChanged when displaying shell alert on Windows 10 #8877
  • How to measure the FPS ? #8876
  • How to profile MAUI on iOS? #8875
  • Picker's SelectedIndexChanged event run infinitely when changing ControlTemplate #8874
  • Labels in VerticalStackLayout in a CollectionView without a WidthRequest is not wrapping according to the LineBreakMode #8873
  • SearchBar focused event is not working on Android. #8872

Closed

  • SwipeView SwipeItemView Layout error #8343
    6.0-servicing
  • Maui templates not visible when Dotnet 7.0 SDK installed #8903
  • MAUI Template not found when new solution is created #8905
  • Unable to publish .NET MAUI app on Mac - Runtime Identifier error #8892
  • Publishing MAUI Blazor App with dotnet publish #8637
  • Using a compatibility renderer on Android/Windows fails to start the App #8183
  • Android - Shell footer occupies whole page when it contains grid RowDefinitions * #8733
  • Entitlements.plist for MacCatalyst #8640
  • Newly Introduced System.AccessViolationException #8168
  • Hot Reload not reflect Frame property changes #8223
  • builder.Services.BuildServiceProvider() returns null on iOS #8231
  • Control with ControlTemplate not showing in page #8281
  • EXEC : The application cannot be opened for an unexpected reason #8630
  • MAUI Solution asking for Workloads when they are all installed. #8657
  • MAUI Shell FlyoutContent Bug #8148
  • [Android] ObjectDisposedException 'AndroidX.AppCompat.View.Menu.MenuItemImpl' Modifying Shell Items #8101
  • Run Maui MSI on window server 2019 not working. #8830
  • Shell Navigation to another Tab doesn't work - Opens new instance of page instead #7628
  • NavigationPage gets crashed with release mode in Android #8245
  • Orange horizontal strip in tabbed page with hamburger navigation #8349
  • it looks like the webpage at https:/0.0.0.0/ might be having issues #8613
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WindowsAppSDK #8914
  • Make Date/Time Pickers on Android only pop up when tapped/clicked/enter key hit #8913
  • Update to Preview 7 (OLD) #8889
  • Update to Preview 7 #8884
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8879
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 #8878
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix wrong RadialGradient on Border #8408
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr4
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker Format not working #7991
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8871
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22368.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22369.1 #8859
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
